#settings

= Available Settings =

All Settings can be defined in your projects settings-file (settings.py) or the !FileBrowsers settings-file (fb_settings.py). When using the projects settings-file, you have to use the prefix "FILEBROWSER_" for every setting (e.g. FILEBROWSER_PATH_SERVER instead of PATH_SERVER).

----
==== URL_WWW ====
The location for your media-files. This is the initial directory for the !FileBrowser.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: settings.MEDIA_URL + 'uploads/'_
----
==== URL_ADMIN ====
The !FileBrowser Admin-URL.

  * *Required*
  * Default: /admin/filebrowser/
----
==== URL_HOME ====
The URL to your Admin Index-Site.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: /admin/_
----
==== PATH_SERVER ====
The URL to your Admin Index-Site.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: os.path.join(settings.MEDIA_ROOT, 'uploads')_
----
==== PATH_FILEBROWSER_MEDIA ====
The URL to your Admin Index-Site.

  * *Required*
  * Default: /media/admin/filebrowser/
----
==== PATH_TINYMCE ====
The path to your TinyMCE Installation.

  * *Only necessary if you use the !FileBrowser with TinyMCE)*
  * _Default: /media/admin/tinymce/jscripts/tiny_mce/_
----
==== EXTENSIONS ====
Allowed Extensions for File Upload. Please be aware that there are Icons for the default extension settings. If you rename "Sound" to "Music", you also have to rename the Sound-Icon within the img-directory.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: {'Folder':[''], 'Image':['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.gif','.png','.tif','.tiff'], 'Video':['.mov','.wmv','.mpeg','.mpg','.avi','.rm'], 'Document':['.pdf','.doc','.rtf','.txt','.xls','.csv'], 'Sound':['.mp3','.mp4','.wav','.aiff','.midi'], 'Code':['.html','.py','.js','.css']}_
----
==== MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE ====
The URL to your Admin Index-Site.

  * *Required*
  * _Default: 5000000_
----
==== THUMB_PREFIX ====
  * The prefix for your thumbnals. If you have an Image called "myimage.jpg", your thumbnail will be called "thumb_myimage.jpg" by default.
  * Note: This Thumbnail is for diplaying your Image within the Admin-Interface. It´s not intended to use this Thumbnail on your Website (use "Image Generator" instead).
  * _Default: thumb__
----
==== THUMBNAIL_SIZE ====
  * The size of your thumbnails for the Admin-Interface.
  * Note: This Thumbnail is for diplaying your Image within the Admin-Interface. It´s not intended to use this Thumbnail on your Website (use "Image Generator" instead).
  * Default: /admin/
----
==== USE_IMAGE_GENERATOR ====
Whether or not to use the !ImageGenerator. When this is *True*, you´ll get a checkbox called "Use Image Generator" with every Upload-Field. Moreover, every Image will have a button "Generate Images" to generate Image versions (this is useful, if Images are uploaded using FTP and not the !FileBrowser - you can upload Images using FTP and generate the Image Versions afterwards).

  * *Required*
  * Default: True
----
==== IMAGE_GENERATOR_DIRECTORY ====
  * The postfix for your "Image Versions"-directory. If you Upload an Image called "myimage.jpg", your versions-directory will be called "myimage_jpg_versions" by default.
  * Default: _versions
----
==== IMAGE_GENERATOR_LANDSCAPE ====
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
----
==== IMAGE_GENERATOR_PORTRAIT ====
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
----
==== IMAGE_CROP_GENERATOR ====
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/
